title: The Dangerous Jacob Wilde
description: Jacob Wilde lived a fast and furious life of reckless abandon...until his wild streak put a cruel end to a life spent in pursuit of pleasure...The Texan ranching grapevine is legendary, so Addison McDowell has heard all about Jake Wilde's shameless past - and his scarred, solitary present. But her only focus is her future - which won't include the impossibly arrogant Jacob Wilde! Addison is no Texan wallflower - when Jake starts a fight, she's more than capable of finishing it! However, a searing attraction to a man she knows cannot love her back? That she has no idea how to handle...i The Wilde Brothers Wilde by name, unashamedly wild by nature!
author: Sandra Marton
